body: This needs to be translated, I can feel the characters emotions through the screen but I can't tell what they're trying to convey to eachother
>flies in >turns your friend into a futa >refuses to elaborate >leaves
And then, out of NOWHERE- LOWTIERGOD WITH THE LIGHTNING EYES
someone NEEDS to translate this author's works

Some of the more soulful level drain yuri corruption hentai I've ever seen. I don't care what anyone else says, the devolving relationship and bittersweetness portrayed here gets me so hard. More hentai should try out RPG stat/class boxes like this one, too.
the demon queen is a culture of woman as well
Yea it was good till she was samurai was dying then that pissed me off. Killed the story for me. Think that it should of had a good end to this crappy one
Can't fight what your nature is, pretty good portrayal of why humans have conflicts with monsters and demons in these fantasy series.
feels like it needs a sequel. very underrated
no one  made it past nnn

Never mind my first post. Damn this writer! I noticed at the end the eye that was crying on the succubus wasn't demonic like the eye that wasn't and at the end the samurai girl was breaking apart and her eye going full demonic meant she was fully corrupted and now only saw her as prey to be eaten! One story with at least a bittersweet ending writer. JUST ONE! It's good, but depressing after reading their other work! Not too much. as I'm use to this stuff! But damn does "Too Bleak, Stopped Caring" describe my mood afterwards LOL

But seriously, a continuing theme of this artist is "No good deed goes unpunished" with the Female Character (s) Take the Cyborg one where despite what she tried, the kids she protected were still captured and "horribly raped" in the case of the girls or broken and brainwashed into rapist with the boys while she's left broken and dead....I think! Then you have the one with the Priest Girl who gets turned into a staff by a monster at the end after horrible rape by her protectors! and the Goblin one which MAY or may not be a delusion (the end made me wonder if she was ever really Rescued!) Seriously stop being EDGY AND BLEAK WRITER?

Wow, this feels like the only work this artist has done that DOESN'T END IN A COMPELTE DOWNER! (I know I can't read non-english, but please, LET E HAVE THIS ONE LOL)

Can't tell if the Succubus chose to kill her or enslave her! In a way if not for her saving and raising her, the Succubus who beat her might have just killed her then and there instead of trying to entertain herself by forcing a "Farmer and the Viper" scenario where the chances of them escaping was valid! (I think the page near the end was the Succubus killing the Succubi who were watching in order to take the Samurai girl away! I don't know, but I'll view it as such). Feels like the Succubus story is a sad twofer where to save them, she had to become the "Viper" and now their relationship can never go beyond Mistress and Slave because she's always holding back that dark side that just wants to toy and eat the Samurai girl (she almost silped and let her fall to her death before catching her!)
